It's a slippery slope. The Killer (in SHORTS, short-sleeved-BUTTON DOWN and SUNGLASSES) crosses the lovely, spotless KITCHEN.

scenes.heading: INT. ESTATE HOUSE, LIVING ROOM -- LATE DAY
scenes.actionPreview: 347 347 The Killer carries the tray thru. This room, like the rest of the breathtaking home, is entirely restored.

scenes.heading: EXT. ESTATE HOUSE, BACK YARD-POOL/BEACH AREA -- LATE DAY

dialogues.text: Magdala, in a CHAISE, looks up as The Killer places the serving tray on a TABLE.
If, in the brief time we're all given, you can’t accept this... well, maybe you’re not one of the few.

scenes.actionPreview: 348 348 The Killer crosses from the house... Heading for a grouping of LOUNGE FURNITURE which faces the BEACH, not far beyond, and stunning SKIES. CONTINUED 122. 123.
